verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Command <WH6680> <WH8761> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto them, My offering <WH7133>, and my bread <WH3899> for my sacrifices made by fire <WH801>, for a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381> unto me, shall ye observe <WH8104> <WH8799> to offer <WH7126> <WH8687> unto me in their due season <WH4150>.

And thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8804> unto them, This is the offering made by fire <WH801> which ye shall offer <WH7126> <WH8686> unto the YY <WH3068>; two <WH8147> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without spot <WH8549> day by day <WH3117>, for a continual <WH8548> burnt offering <WH5930>.
The one <WH259> lamb <WH3532> shalt thou offer <WH6213> <WH8799> in the morning <WH1242>, and the other <WH8145> lamb <WH3532> shalt thou offer <WH6213> <WH8799> at even <WH6153>;

And a tenth <WH6224> part of an ephah <WH374> of flour <WH5560> for a meat offering <WH4503>, mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with the fourth <WH7243> part of an hin <WH1969> of beaten <WH3795> oil <WH8081>.

It is a continual <WH8548> burnt offering <WH5930>, which was ordained <WH6213> <WH8803> in mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514> for a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381>, a sacrifice made by fire <WH801> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And the drink offering <WH5262> thereof shall be the fourth <WH7243> part of an hin <WH1969> for the one <WH259> lamb <WH3532>: in the holy <WH6944> place shalt thou cause the strong wine <WH7941> to be poured <WH5258> <WH8685> unto the YY <WH3068> for a drink offering <WH5262>.

And the other <WH8145> lamb <WH3532> shalt thou offer <WH6213> <WH8799> at even <WH6153>: as the meat offering <WH4503> of the morning <WH1242>, and as the drink offering <WH5262> thereof, thou shalt offer <WH6213> <WH8799> it, a sacrifice made by fire <WH801>, of a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And on the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117> two <WH8147> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without spot <WH8549>, and two <WH8147> tenth <WH6241> deals of flour <WH5560> for a meat offering <WH4503>, mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>, and the drink offering <WH5262> thereof:
This is the burnt offering <WH5930> of every sabbath <WH7676>, beside the continual <WH8548> burnt offering <WH5930>, and his drink offering <WH5262>.

And in the beginnings <WH7218> of your months <WH2320> ye shall offer <WH7126> <WH8686> a burnt offering <WH5930> unto the YY <WH3068>; two <WH8147> young <WH1241> bullocks <WH6499>, and one <WH259> ram <WH352>, seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without spot <WH8549>;

And three <WH7969> tenth deals <WH6241> of flour <WH5560> for a meat offering <WH4503>, mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>, for one <WH259> bullock <WH6499>; and two <WH8147> tenth <WH6241> deals of flour <WH5560> for a meat offering <WH4503>, mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>, for one <WH259> ram <WH352>;

And a several tenth deal <WH6241> of flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081> for a meat offering <WH4503> unto one <WH259> lamb <WH3532>; for a burnt offering <WH5930> of a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381>, a sacrifice made by fire <WH801> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And their drink offerings <WH5262> shall be half <WH2677> an hin <WH1969> of wine <WH3196> unto a bullock <WH6499>, and the third <WH7992> part of an hin <WH1969> unto a ram <WH352>, and a fourth <WH7243> part of an hin <WH1969> unto a lamb <WH3532>: this is the burnt offering <WH5930> of every month <WH2320> throughout the months <WH2320> of the year <WH8141>.

And one <WH259> kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795> for a sin offering <WH2403> unto the YY <WH3068> shall be offered <WH6213> <WH8735>, beside the continual <WH8548> burnt offering <WH5930>, and his drink offering <WH5262>.
And in the fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> is the passover <WH6453> of the YY <WH3068>.
And in the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of this month <WH2320> is the feast <WH2282>: seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shall matzah <WH4682> be eaten <WH398> <WH8735>.
In the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> shall be an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>; ye shall do <WH6213> <WH8799> no manner of servile <WH5656> work <WH4399> therein:

But ye shall offer <WH7126> <WH8689> a sacrifice made by fire <WH801> for a burnt offering <WH5930> unto the YY <WH3068>; two <WH8147> young <WH1241> bullocks <WH6499>, and one <WH259> ram <WH352>, and seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141>: they shall be unto you without blemish <WH8549>:

And their meat offering <WH4503> shall be of flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>: three <WH7969> tenth deals <WH6241> shall ye offer <WH6213> <WH8799> for a bullock <WH6499>, and two <WH8147> tenth deals <WH6241> for a ram <WH352>;
A several tenth deal <WH6241> shalt thou offer <WH6213> <WH8799> for every <WH259> lamb <WH3532>, throughout the seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532>:
And one <WH259> goat <WH8163> for a sin offering <WH2403>, to make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8763> for you.
Ye shall offer <WH6213> <WH8799> these beside the burnt offering <WH5930> in the morning <WH1242>, which is for a continual <WH8548> burnt offering <WH5930>.

After this manner ye shall offer <WH6213> <WH8799> daily <WH3117>, throughout the seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, the meat <WH3899> of the sacrifice made by fire <WH801>, of a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381> unto the YY <WH3068>: it shall be offered <WH6213> <WH8735> beside the continual <WH8548> burnt offering <WH5930>, and his drink offering <WH5262>.
And on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> ye shall have an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>; ye shall do <WH6213> <WH8799> no servile <WH5656> work <WH4399>.

Also in the day <WH3117> of the firstfruits <WH1061>, when ye bring <WH7126> <WH8687> a new <WH2319> meat offering <WH4503> unto the YY <WH3068>, after your weeks <WH7620> be out, ye shall have an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>; ye shall do <WH6213> <WH8799> no servile <WH5656> work <WH4399>:

But ye shall offer <WH7126> <WH8689> the burnt offering <WH5930> for a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381> unto the YY <WH3068>; two <WH8147> young <WH1241> bullocks <WH6499>, one <WH259> ram <WH352>, seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141>;

And their meat offering <WH4503> of flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>, three <WH7969> tenth deals <WH6241> unto one <WH259> bullock <WH6499>, two <WH8147> tenth deals <WH6241> unto one <WH259> ram <WH352>,
A several tenth deal <WH6241> unto one <WH259> lamb <WH3532>, throughout the seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532>;
And one <WH259> kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795>, to make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8763> for you.

Ye shall offer <WH6213> <WH8799> them beside the continual <WH8548> burnt offering <WH5930>, and his meat offering <WH4503>, (they shall be unto you without blemish <WH8549> ) and their drink offerings <WH5262>.
